feed.title: Dozzle Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.11.9
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Safe area styling for ios pwa  -  by @stasadance in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3693 (e0797)
  • Adds inset for left and right  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3694 (0ffdd)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • deps: Update vueuse monorepo to v13 (major)  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3697 (ababa)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.12.0
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Adds terminal mode to attach or exec shell on a container  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3726 (ea213)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes theme color in dark and light mode  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3706 (c3ee2)
  • Fixes rotate degree on close button for drawer  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3729 (7a691)
  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3699 (97ece)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3700 (9e2d0)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3702 (c8842)
  • Update dependency splitpanes to ^4.0.3  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3704 (46fdb)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3714 (7c2b7)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3715 (c66bb)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3717 (38383)
  • Update module github.com/rs/zerolog to v1.34.0  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3718 (ae483)
  • Update dependency vite to v6.2.3 [security]  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3721 (91b9c)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3722 (f863f)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3725 (da665)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.12.1
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • Only shows attach and shell for docker  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3731 (410f5)

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.12.2
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Adds shell behind a flag or env var  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3737 (076f5)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Update and improve zh-tw Traditional Chinese locale  -  by @PeterDaveHello in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3736 (b8a87)
  • Fixes cursor color on shell  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3738 (9ae7c)
  • deps: Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3735 (d5abf)
  • docs: Updates docs for shell  -  by @amir20 (ddcc5)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.12.3
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Adds shell support for agents and swarm mode  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3739 (27478)
    View changes on GitHub
